text.p: These are the leading stories in the Tunisian press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Tunisia and Iraq signed a cooperation accord in Tunis on agriculture to boost exchanges in cereal seed, olive and palm trees and technicians.
- Annual meeting for Tunisians living abroad, held in Tunis last week, urged them to increase savings and investments in their motherland.
- Cost of building the first part of an extension to fair premises in the eastern resort of Sousse amounted to two million dinars.
